text: pachi setane te bannena hrdayamam kuvicara nakhyo, jethi te'ona guptanga je ekabijathi chupa hata, banneni same jahera tha'i jaya ane kaheva lagyo ke tamara palanahare tamane bannene a vrksani najika javathi etala mate rokya hata ke tame banne kyanka pharista bani java, athava to kyanka hammesa jivita loko manthi tha'i java
